mapper.insert: insert into t_auth_user (id, create_time, `status`, account, disabled, nick_name, `password`, salt, totp_secret, account_level) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totpSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, create_time, `status`, account, disabled, nick_name, `password`, salt, totp_secret, account_level from t_auth_user
select id, create_time, `status`, account, disabled, nick_name, `password`, salt, totp_secret, account_level from t_auth_user u where u.nick_name = ${userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
